definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
beef grilled on a hot iron plate

sentences.english: How did you find the veal cutlet?
Doris is always beefing about her food.
sentences.chinese: 对于食物，多利斯总是吃牛肉。

sentences.english: I want some more of your dynamite stewed beef, please.
sentences.chinese: 请再给我一些你们那种美味可口的炖牛肉。

sentences.english: Please let us have two veals.
I particularly love their Rice Noodle Soup, and the Panang Curry chicken over rice.
sentences.chinese: 我特别喜欢他们的牛肉汤河粉和黄咖哩鸡烩饭。

sentences.english: The best beef is obtained from steers and heifers (female cows that have not calved ).
sentences.chinese: 最好的牛肉来自食用牛和小母牛。

sentences.english: Rippingale chose a beef dish and was eating it while watching an in-flight movie.
sentences.chinese: 里平格尔选了一份牛肉，边吃边看电影。

sentences.english: How about we have a beef and tomato stew to start?
sentences.chinese: 我们先点个牛肉炖西红柿怎么样？
我要弄红脍牛肉作晚餐。

sentences.english: Giraffe made of polenta and roast beef pieces.
sentences.chinese: 粥和烤牛肉片做的长颈鹿。

sentences.english: The best-known British dish eaten at home has been roast beef, traditionally eaten on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 英国最出名的家庭菜是烤牛肉，通常在周日吃。

sentences.english: Heating in low temperature could prolong the shelf-life of the spiced beef in a certain extent.
sentences.chinese: 低温加热灭菌可在一定程度上延长卤牛肉的货架期。

sentences.english: Slowly cooked beef with olive and tomatoes served with rice.
sentences.chinese: 慢煮牛肉，配秘制番茄沙司和青橄榄。

sentences.english: Tongliao Museum of Han Shan tea this beef jerky, 25 pound.
sentences.chinese: 通辽的罕山奶茶馆有这种牛肉干，25一斤。

sentences.english: Chop mixed peels finely. Mix well with minced beef mixture.
sentences.chinese: 切幼干果皮，拌入牛肉混合物内。

sentences.english: Rib Eye, with Roasted Provencal Potatoes, Spinach Cream and Vegetable Ragout.
sentences.chinese: 肉眼牛肉，配香草烤土豆，奶油菠菜和烩蔬菜。

definition: pork chop/pork cutlet/spare ribs/(coll.) skinny person
